data.title: Thank You!
data.body:
This site is dedicated to those who are interested in the small and yet important things. Without their help it wouldn't be possible to provide you [Manic][manic]. I would like to thank everyone for their support. | Designer | |:---:| | Luka Cvrk - Minimalistica (ported by [Mrisaacs][mri]) | | Tools Programmer | |:-:| | Dave Gamache - Skeleton
Estevão Soares - Showdown
George Phillips - Content Preloader
Krasimir Tsonev - Navigo
Valerio Proietti & MooTools Developers - MooTools | | Hosted on | |:-:| | Tom Preston-Werner & Chris Wanstrath & PJ Hyett - GitHub | [manic]: http://mrisaacs.github.io/manic [mri]: http://mrisaacs.github.io [GitHub]: https://github.com
